title: Tried to come back. Can't.
body:
TL;DR: This is a post of a nobody crying like a kid about the toxic community. 

I know, I know. "Oh, boo hoo some little baby is sad that some big meanies said mean things on the internet, oh boo hoo", but truly: I can't anymore.

I used to play this game a lot. From Season 3 up to Season 6 (I think. I know Tahm Kench was the last hero released before I last quit), I played a bunch because I was having some genuine fun. The games could go on for 15-20 minutes or they could be those  long, hour slobber knockers but generally speaking I enjoyed myself. 

But as time goes along and the game became more popular: so too did the toxicity. Eventually, it caught up to me and I left the game and the community in a sense. 

Time goes by and I started to get a bit of an itch to play again, so I reinstalled the launcher and found myself lost among all the changes. New champions. New rune systems. No more mastery trees. Some familiar faces got mini-reworks. Some got overhauls. New items. Some items removed. It took me about a week of on and off play to start to figure things out.

And I was having fun. 

Until; I'd say this month: I've noticed I'd go against some players that were both more experienced than I, and quite simply far better than me. I won't deny that I am not good. I mean: I'm Iron elo after all, and feel no shame admitting that. Its where I belong.

However, with this change in the general playerbase I was being pitted against, too also saw the removal of any fun I was having. I'm getting killed. Stomped. Brutalized. Any confidence I was building is gone. I watch guides. I used the practice tool. But nothing really seems to work. 

I know, I know "get good", but really getting good isn't my issue here. My issue is the playerbase. The community. I perform poorly, I know. But I try my best. But it isn't enough. People just go off on me as if I physically assaulted a family member of theirs. Tossing completely baseless accusations of me intentionally feeding when I botch a flash, or miss a Sej ult. Telling me to essentially kill myself when I struggle with the new jungle and being behind 2+ levels at all times. Berating me for losing my lane when I'm simply just outclassed by the opponent. Spam pings, spam of hate in chat. I shouldn't have to mute 2 or 3 members of my team every match.

This isn't fun. And honestly, this is why the community is poorly thought of. It hasn't changed one bit. And now, I'm done. 

I know I'm a nobody. I came in a nobody and am leaving a nobody. However I wanted to get my thoughts out and to vent some aggravation. I don't know the solution to this problem, except quite simply to not play anymore. 

To anyone who may have played with or against me that had some amount of fun: I hope you continue to enjoy the game, and that all goes well in life for you.
